name: Toxic Waters
description:
For the 2020 Gamejam+

Use the mouse to move the dolphin

Left click to send out Sonar

Right Click to boost, boosting can destroy cracked objects

Collect toxic barrels to powerup

Theme: Protectors of Nature

Diversifiers: Run out of Ink, Variations under a theme

#G4C #PC

Engine Used: Unity

Studio Boiz: London, England

Gregory Jackson: Lead Developer and Coder

Alistair Pearlman: Design and coding

Daniel Aminoff: Sound Design
